title: AWS Step Functions with direct integration with Private REST API Gateway Custom Domain
description: The SAM template deploys a Step Functions Standard workflow that invokes a Private REST API Gateway Custom Domain.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Start the Standard Workflow using the start-execution api.
The Workflow invokes the Private REST API Gateway Custom Domain using the EventBridge Connection created using the SAM template.
EventBridge Connection is configured with the Amazon VPC Lattice and AWS PrivateLink to connect to Private API within AWS network.

bullets.text: AWS Step Functions - Call third-party APIs
External endpoints and testing of task states now available in AWS Step Functions
Amazon EventBridge and AWS Step Functions announce integration with private APIs
